name: Zucchini And Dill Salad
description: This easy salad will take a pound and a half of zucchini off your hands. It is simple and requires very little cooking, and the dill elevates its excellence mightily.
keywords: dill, zucchini, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup corn, peanut or vegetable oil

recipeInstructions.text: Trim off ends of zucchini. Cut crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices. There should be about 6 cups.

Bring enough water to boil to cover slices. Add slices and simmer 1 1/2 minutes. Do not overcook; they must remain a bit crisp. Drain quickly, run under cold water and drain thoroughly again. Let cool or chill in the refrigerator.
Put mustard and vinegar in mixing bowl and start beating with wire whisk while gradually adding oil. Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir in dill.
Add zucchini slices and toss to blend. Serve.
